hero.name: Gabriel Nogueira
hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: I like fast code, clean interfaces and simple solutions for complex problems. I always seek to make processes more efficient and automatic.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Developer passionate about technology and innovation
about.description: I'm a full stack developer with over 3 years of experience, specialized in creating digital solutions that make a difference. My passion is transforming complex ideas into simple and efficient products.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.paragraph1: I like fast code, clean interfaces and solving problems that seem complicated in a simple way. I constantly think about startup ideas and spend a good part of my time thinking about how to make processes more efficient, automatic and intuitive.
introduction.paragraph2: My specialty is creating ultra-performant backends, capable of running with minimal memory consumption under high load. On the frontend layer, I seek to build clean and consistent interfaces, always guided by minimalist design principles. My purpose is to unite technical performance with a clear and fluid user experience.
introduction.paragraph3: I learn by building, improve by iterating, and believe that the best version of any idea is born after many attempts. My goal is to create products that not only work well, but also inspire confidence and curiosity in those who use them.
introduction.paragraph4: I'm trying to do something big. Even if it takes a hundred iterations.

descriptions.junior: Quickly promoted after the internship due to high-impact deliveries in the company's operations. Currently working on the front line of projects, participating in strategic meetings, solution planning and development of critical systems focused on performance and accounting automation. Among the main results, the corporate panel stands out, which reduced by at least 50% the time spent on manual processes in the corporate sector, through RPAs and automations that eliminated dependence on portals such as e-CAC and city halls.
descriptions.trainee: Internship in developing accounting automations, creating integrations and internal systems to optimize company processes. Among the deliverables, the certificates panel stands out, which brought total control over more than 500 documents and increased productivity by +80% for the responsible team.
descriptions.support: Worked as an outsourced IT support analyst for Caixa Econômica Federal, handling internal calls from Cercred and external calls from Caixa throughout Brazil. In addition to help desk activities, I developed proprietary solutions that optimized the team's work by 100%: a web Help Desk system (authorized by Caixa) that replaced manual control in Excel spreadsheets and an automatic email signature generator, eliminating the need for manual creation in Photoshop.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Some of my most recent work

page.title: Projects
page.subtitle: Some of my most recent work

toivo.title: Toivo
toivo.description: Revolutionary productivity app that combines Kanban, Pomodoro and a personalized AI as your personal assistant. Transform your productivity with focus, organization and artificial intelligence.

saldomais.title: Saldo+
saldomais.description: Personal assistant for income and expense control for self-employed workers. Record earnings, track progress and get intelligent insights with AI to maximize your income.

brasilIoApi.title: Brasil.io Golang REST API
brasilIoApi.description: Ultra-performant Go API that consumes public government spending data. One of Brazil's fastest APIs with 117.38 MB/s throughput and 8.74ms response time.

echoNotes.title: Echo Notes
echoNotes.description: Intelligent note-taking system that automatically converts audio to text. Record your notes by speaking and they are transcribed instantly using AI. Modern interface with advanced search and automatic organization.

menuOnline.title: Menu Online
menuOnline.description: Complete online menu system for snack bars. Customers select items, choose delivery or pickup, automatically calculate fees and finalize orders via WhatsApp with all detailed information.

qrCodeGenerator.title: QRCode Generator
qrCodeGenerator.description: Universal QR Code generator that creates codes for any type of content. Intuitive interface with size, color customization options and direct download of the generated code.

primeFlix.title: PrimeFlix
primeFlix.description: Movie platform that consumes The Movie DB API to display updated releases. Users can rate movies, add to favorites, watch trailers and read complete synopses.

easyFinance.title: Easy Finance
easyFinance.description: Web application for financial control optimized for mobile devices. Intuitive interface designed to manage expenses and income easily on your phone.

donutAnimation.title: Donut Animation
donutAnimation.description: Interactive donut animation that rotates 360° continuously. Created with pure CSS and JavaScript for speed and direction control of rotation.

folderOrganizer.title: Folder Organizer
folderOrganizer.description: Python script to automatically organize files by extension. Identifies file types and moves them to corresponding subfolders, saving time in directory organization.

crudJs.title: CRUD JavaScript
crudJs.description: Simple customer registration system developed with HTML, CSS and pure JavaScript. Clean and functional interface for managing customer data with create, read, update and delete operations.

financeControl.title: Finance Control
financeControl.description: Financial control system for managing income and expenses. Intuitive interface with financial summary, transaction registration and real-time balance control.

calcJs.title: Calc.Js
calcJs.description: Modern web calculator with light and dark theme. Developed with pure JavaScript, offers basic operations, parentheses, modulo and result copy functionality.

taskMore.title: Task More
taskMore.description: Innovative task manager with public task functionality. Built with Next.js 13, Firebase Firestore and NextAuth.js. Users can make their tasks public for sharing with other users.

freelCRM.title: FreelCRM
freelCRM.description: Complete and modern CRM for freelancers to manage clients and proposals. Minimalist interface with real-time dashboard, Kanban board for proposals and advanced metrics. Everything synchronized via Supabase Realtime for maximum efficiency.

afilia.title: Afilia Analytics
afilia.description: Complete platform for affiliates of major platforms (Shopee, Amazon, Mercado Livre). Upload CSV/Excel reports, automatic sales analysis, control of best-selling products, conversion metrics and strategic insights to maximize commissions.

smartDocumentAnalyzer.title: Smart Document Analyzer
smartDocumentAnalyzer.description: Intelligent system for academic article analysis. Upload PDFs, automatic summary generation, topic identification and insights using AI (Groq Cloud API + Llama 3). Scalable backend with NestJS and modern frontend with Angular 18.

domsapon.title: Dom Sapon
domsapon.description: Complete barbershop scheduling system with client and admin panels. Ultra responsive interface, instant scheduling via Supabase Realtime, complete service management, clients and revenue tracking. Admin dashboard with real-time metrics, appointment confirmation and full barbershop control.

contact.subtitle: Let's work together!
